attributes.action: Vote on Lucy Allan, Conservative MP for Telford, to resign from parliament
attributes.background: Lucy Allan, conservative MP for Telford who earns over £100,000 a year, has joined her fellow puppets to belittle industrial action by junior doctors, with a poor grasp of the issues at hand. She has been flagged for bullying colleagues in Westminster and now has extended this to junior doctors.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual MP is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
